query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vorvertragTemplates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tenantId INT NOT NULL,
  version VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  
  templateText TEXT NOT NULL,
  
  checkboxZuarbeitText TEXT,
  checkboxTeilnahmeText TEXT,
  checkboxDatenschutzText TEXT,
  checkboxAgbText TEXT,
  
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdBy INT,
  
  INDEX idx_vorvertragTemplates_tenant (tenantId),
  INDEX idx_vorvertragTemplates_active (tenantId, isActive),
  
  FOREIGN KEY (tenantId) REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Ljv7tUcUqkJWz2.a9fc2ac34f70 --database Q4zKBZCPW5Fmg3HtsHcjY8 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vorvertragTemplates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tenantId INT NOT NULL,
  version VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  
  templateText TEXT NOT NULL,
  
  checkboxZuarbeitText TEXT,
  checkboxTeilnahmeText TEXT,
  checkboxDatenschutzText TEXT,
  checkboxAgbText TEXT,
  
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdBy INT,
  
  INDEX idx_vorvertragTemplates_tenant (tenantId),
  INDEX idx_vorvertragTemplates_active (tenantId, isActive),
  
  FOREIGN KEY (tenantId) REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
